short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances the rumble.com viewing experience by providing a fullscreen chat overlay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Messages flow seamlessly from right to left, providing an immersive chat environment while you enjoy your content. 

Features

- Fullscreen chat overlay for Rumble

- Elegant right-to-left message transition 

- Anti-Spam Setting: A configurable option that reduces spam by preventing multiple identical messages from appearing simultaneously.
